summary: This is my second mod. I wanted a black textured dragonebone bow to go with my set.
descriptionHtml:
This is basically my first mod, and the first mod I post. I wanted a black textured dragonebone bow to go with my set. This is a simple retexture.
Fort this mod to work you NEED Dawnguard.

To manually install this, add the \"textures\" folder in your skyrim \"Data\" folder. Overwrite if needed.

This is basically my first mod, the other one being just a gemstone recolor. Please endorse if you want, means a lot to me. I am proud see that you appreciate and like this mod because it inspired me to contine making them and i hope to get better at modding. I hope to be able to do more than just retextures in the close future. Thank you for taking your time to evaluate my mod, and hope you like it. Seee you soon !

It shouldn\'t have any compatibility issues, but if it does, please let me know.
author: crazzyel
